channel.title: Inventory area help!
channel.description: Hey, i wanted the new look to my inventory area. like new spellbook, green friend, red ignore, music etc... so i made on using the interface maker, and put the codes in, and nothing changed. am i doing this right. class 9?

item.title: Inventory area help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“tman915, post:1, topic:330763”]Hey, i wanted the new look to my inventory area. like new spellbook, green friend, red ignore, music etc…
so i made on using the interface maker, and put the codes in,
and nothing changed.
am i doing this right.
class 9?[/quote]
All you have to do is go in your client and go under files or spirtes and add them in. This is only client sided and they are not interfaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Inventory area help!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

did you add it server sided as well?

Read full topic
